title: Lesson 8 - Use *ngFor to list objects in component
contents:
mode_edit

第 8 課 - 使用 *ngFor 列出元件中的物件link

Lesson 8 - Use *ngFor to list objects in componentlink

本課程示範瞭如何在 Angular 範本中使用 ngFor 指令，以便在範本中動態顯示出重複資料。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to use ngFor directive in Angular templates in order to display dynamically repeat data data in a template.

所需時間： 完成這節課預計需要 10 分鐘左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 10 minutes to complete this lesson.

開始之前link

Before you startlink

這節課以上一課的程式碼為起點，你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在整合開發環境（IDE）中使用你在第 7 課中建立的程式碼。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 7 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 從上一課的程式碼範例開始。選擇，以便

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 7 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的線上例子，其中 StackBlitz 的介面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下載範例並在你的 IDE 中開啟它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你還沒看過簡介，請存取 Angular 課程簡介以確保你已具備完成這節課所需的一切知識。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在這節課中遇到任何問題，可以檢視這節課的完整程式碼，參見。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之後link

After you finishlink

  • 你將嚮應用程式新增一個數據集

    You will have added a data set to the app

  • 應用程式將使用 ngFor 顯示新資料集中的元素列表

    Your app will display a list of elements from the new data set using ngFor

ngFor 的概念性預覽link

Conceptual preview of ngForlink

在 Angular 中，ngFor 是一種特定型別的指令，用於動態重複範本中的資料。在純 JavaScript 中，你會使用 for迴圈 —— 而 ngFor 為 Angular 範本提供了類似的功能。我們使用Angular 範本語法來指定指令的詳細資訊。

In Angular, ngFor is a specific type of directive used to dynamically repeat data in a template. In plain JavaScript you would use a for loop - ngFor provides similar functionality for Angular templates. We use Angular template syntax to specify the details for the directive.

你可以利用 ngFor 來迭代陣列甚至非同步值。在這節課中，你將新增一個新的資料陣列以進行迭代。

You can utilize ngFor to iterate over arrays and even asynchronous values. In this lesson, you'll add a new array of data to iterate over.

更深入的解釋，請參閱內建指令指南。

For a more in depth explanation, please refer to the Built-in directives guide.

課程步驟link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中對應用程式程式碼執行下列步驟。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 將房屋資料新增到 HomeComponentlink

Step 1 - Add housing data to the HomeComponentlink

在 HomeComponent 中只有一個房屋位置。在此步驟中，你將新增一組 HousingLocation 條目。

In the HomeComponent there is only a single housing location. In this step, you will add an array of HousingLocation entries.

  1. 在 src/app/home/home.component.ts 中，從 HomeComponent 類刪除 housingLocation 屬性。

    In src/app/home/home.component.ts, remove the housingLocation property from the HomeComponent class.

  2. 更新 HomeComponent 類，來讓它具備名為 housingLocationList 的屬性。更新你的程式碼以匹配以下程式碼：

    update the HomeComponent class to have a property called housingLocationList. Update your code to match the following code:

    export class HomeComponent { housingLocationList: HousingLocation[] = [ { id: 0, name: 'Acme Fresh Start Housing', city: 'Chicago', state: 'IL', photo: '/assets/bernard-hermant-CLKGGwIBTaY-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 4, wifi: true, laundry: true }, { id: 1, name: 'A113 Transitional Housing', city: 'Santa Monica', state: 'CA', photo: '/assets/brandon-griggs-wR11KBaB86U-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 0, wifi: false, laundry: true }, { id: 2, name: 'Warm Beds Housing Support', city: 'Juneau', state: 'AK', photo: '/assets/i-do-nothing-but-love-lAyXdl1-Wmc-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 1, wifi: false, laundry: false }, { id: 3, name: 'Homesteady Housing', city: 'Chicago', state: 'IL', photo: '/assets/ian-macdonald-W8z6aiwfi1E-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 1, wifi: true, laundry: false }, { id: 4, name: 'Happy Homes Group', city: 'Gary', state: 'IN', photo: '/assets/krzysztof-hepner-978RAXoXnH4-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 1, wifi: true, laundry: false }, { id: 5, name: 'Hopeful Apartment Group', city: 'Oakland', state: 'CA', photo: '/assets/r-architecture-JvQ0Q5IkeMM-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 2, wifi: true, laundry: true }, { id: 6, name: 'Seriously Safe Towns', city: 'Oakland', state: 'CA', photo: '/assets/phil-hearing-IYfp2Ixe9nM-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 5, wifi: true, laundry: true }, { id: 7, name: 'Hopeful Housing Solutions', city: 'Oakland', state: 'CA', photo: '/assets/r-architecture-GGupkreKwxA-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 2, wifi: true, laundry: true }, { id: 8, name: 'Seriously Safe Towns', city: 'Oakland', state: 'CA', photo: '/assets/saru-robert-9rP3mxf8qWI-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 10, wifi: false, laundry: false }, { id: 9, name: 'Capital Safe Towns', city: 'Portland', state: 'OR', photo: '/assets/webaliser-_TPTXZd9mOo-unsplash.jpg', availableUnits: 6, wifi: true, laundry: true } ]; }

    注意：不要刪除 @Component 裝飾器，你將在接下來的步驟中更新該程式碼。

    Note: Do not remove the @Component decorator, you will update that code in an upcoming step.

第 2 步 - 更新 HomeComponent 範本以使用 ngForlink

Step 2 - Update the HomeComponent template to use ngForlink

現在應用程式有一個數據集，你可以使用它來藉助 ngFor 指令在瀏覽器中顯示條目。

Now the app has a dataset that you can use to display the entries in the browser using the ngFor directive.

  1. 將範本程式碼中的 <app-housing-location> 標籤更新為：

    Update the <app-housing-location> tag in the template code to this:

    <app-housing-location *ngFor="let housingLocation of housingLocationList" [housingLocation]="housingLocation"> </app-housing-location>

    注意，程式碼 [housingLocation] = "housingLocation" 中的 housingLocation 值現在指的是 ngFor 指令中使用的變數。在本次更改之前，它參考的是 HomeComponent 類上的屬性。

    Note, the code [housingLocation] = "housingLocation" the housingLocation value now refers to the variable used in the ngFor directive. Before this change, it refered to the property on the HomeComponent class.

  2. 儲存所有更改。

    Save all changes.

  3. 重新整理瀏覽器並確認應用程式現在渲染出了房屋位置網格。

    Refresh the browser and confirm that the app now renders a grid of housing locations.

課程回顧link

Lesson reviewlink

在這節課中，你使用 ngFor 指令在 Angular 範本中動態重複渲染資料。你還添加了要在 Angular 應用程式中使用的新資料陣列。該應用程式現在在瀏覽器中動態渲染房屋位置列表。

In this lesson, you used the ngFor directive to repeat data dynamically in Angular templates. You also added a new array of data to be used in the Angular app. The application now dynamically renders a list of housing locations in the browser.

該應用程式正在成形，幹得好。

The app is taking shape, great job.

如果你在學習這節課時遇到了任何問題，可以在檢視完整程式碼。

If you are having any trouble with this lesson, you can review the completed code for it in the .
